text: Hey John. Can you tell me more about the IT hackathon that your company is sponsoring? Is it team based? Do you have to bring a team? Can you pitch an idea to build a team?
you can pitch an idea at the pre party and join a team
or you can bring a team if you like :simple_smile:
prizes will be assigned to teams?
we are still talking about prizes
I think it will be for best hack (500) best use of smartThings, best use of Pebble, Best use of edison etc

<!channel>: I'm about to hop on my sync with SmartThings - does anyone have any questions I should cover for the hackathon? We're going to be talking about Prizes, outreach, invoicing, & sponsors - but happy to cover anything else we need
Forgot to ask earlier: what's the latest on food for hackathon? Snacks for preparty, breakfast, lunch and snacks for hack.
